channel.title: Adding a item when killing dungoneering boss? (PI)

item.title: Adding a item when killing dungoneering boss? (PI)
item.dc:creator: @sam81199 sam81199
item.description:
@sam81199 wrote:

fixed it by adding
c.getItems().addItem(989,1);

if (npcs[i].npcType == 1977) {
c.dungPoints += 263;
c.getPA().addSkillXP((136000), 23);
c.getItems().addItem(989,1);
c.sendMessage(“You gain 263 dungeoneering tokens and 136.000 exp by killing this boss”);
c.sendMessage(“You dominate this dungeon!”);
c.getPA().movePlayer(3055, 5082, 1);
} // room BOSS

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @jaruanna jaruanna
item.description:
@jaruanna wrote:

sorry i really dont work with pi’s this should work.

#Fareed 1977:100 989:1

1977 being npc id
100 being drop percentage
989 being item id
1 being how much it drops.

item.title: Adding a item when killing dungoneering boss? (PI)
item.dc:creator: @jaruanna jaruanna
item.description:
@jaruanna wrote:

#npc name goes here
####:%%

the 4 “####” is the item id
the %% is the percentage out of 100.

so basically
#Man drops
995:100

the man drops coins 100% of the time

Read full topic

item.title: Adding a item when killing dungoneering boss? (PI)
item.dc:creator: @sam81199 sam81199
item.description:
@sam81199 wrote:

im looking to make it so when you kill t he dungoneering boss it gives you a key can anybody help me please :[?

if (npcs[i].npcType == 1977) {
c.dungPoints += 263;
c.getPA().addSkillXP((136000), 23);
c.sendMessage(“You gain 263 dungeoneering tokens and 136.000 exp by killing this boss”);
c.sendMessage(“You dominate this dungeon!”);
c.getPA().movePlayer(3055, 5082, 1);
} // room BOSS
